title: Amazing, however...
text: During watching videos longer than 10 minutes, the app acts like it crashes except audio is still able to be heard, it‚Äôs just the screen goes black for a few seconds, upwards to about 15 seconds that I‚Äôve experienced, and after the blank out I can‚Äôt interact with the interface at all. Tapping in the screen doesn‚Äôt bring up the video duration or pause button and the home button is buggy. It may just be an iPhone thing or maybe I need to update it again, though. I just thought it was worth mentioning since it happens so often. I even tried reloading the app to see if that would fix the problem. Sadly my efforts didn‚Äôt change much or anything. I think I might‚Äôve actually made it worse.

title: Very good app
text: This is a very good app, not perfect but very good! I will give this app a perfect 5 star rating when and ONLY when, they provide us with an option to filter videos on someone's page by viewed and not viewed. Not just a search bar or something because if you watch vloggers they may have the same video title lord knows how many times. It's not like this would be a hard feature to incorporate into the app and it would make a lot of peoples video searching/surfing so much more enjoyable. If a YouTuber has an off period where they don't post a video for a few weeks or something, I will, depending on who it is, go through their whole video list trying to find old videos I haven't seen yet which can take WAYYY too much time in some cases... SO add a viewed/notviewed filter and you will get five stars from me

title: Mysterious Audio Bug
text: I have been experiencing audio from random videos playing in the background, videos I haven‚Äôt even tapped. It does not matter if I am scrolling through my replies, checking notifications, finding a video I actually want to watch. The only way to end the audio is to close the app and open again. This has been a problem that I have yet to see fixed in any recent update. Imagine how annoying it is that audio you cannot control forces you to close out of the app while you were about to watch a cute cat video. I would like this bug to disappear! And another one off of my list of demands is that I want it easier to tap timestamped links to times in the video from the comments section. And the option to not receive Stories in the feed. I use this app everyday, I would really love for the mysterious audio to begone üôèüèæ

title: No home feed
text: The newer updates have resorted to completely turning off home feed for those with history turned off. I understand ‚Äúoh just turn it on‚Äù but I like the way it works with it off. I don‚Äôt always want recommendations based off how my history is. I like the way it starts a video over from the beginning since chances are if Im rewatching it again I don‚Äôt remember it or maybe I wasn‚Äôt paying attention. There was no reason to remove it and all it‚Äôs done is caused me to watch less videos. Effectively removing some peoples chances and finding new creators simply because you can. Why remove my ability to find new creators when you had it just a week ago? Why even have it as an option to turn it off in the first place if it removes core features from your app? I know its not the biggest thing but it‚Äôs frustrating and I haven‚Äôt seen enough people really making a point out of it yet. Just wanted to bring it up.

title: Changing to worse
text: Don‚Äôt get me wrong I really like the platform but I think it‚Äôs a little too much removing the dislike button and on top of that I don‚Äôt like the layout where you click to see more of the video description and it goes all to the side. Then now the same with the comments! Why that space on the bottom just to show nothing? I liked it much better before when you would click see more and see the description right there and just scroll down and see the comments.  The change on the comments layout is something I see no purpose for. Unless you will place ads there? ü§î Just my opinion, your layout used to be much better before.

title: Absolutely useless "viewer discretion" feature
text: YT premium user of 3 years here. YT music is nearly flawless. Any video can be played as a song, making YT music superior to all other services as far as variety goes. 3 star rating comes from viewer discretion warnings. For example, I added a certain song to my playlist that I've listened to since high school. I listen to this song frequently and still, every single time, my music STOPS so YT can alert me, 20yo, that what I'm listening to pertains to self harm and depression. It comes down to a safety issue when used with car play, as it cannot be bypassed until the phone is turned on and the "continue" option is chosen. If I've added it to my playlist I think I understand what the song is about. This feature needs further optimization before I recommend YT music to others.

title: Good music
text:
The music is good to listen to. How ever there‚Äôs so many commercials. There‚Äôs usually a commercial at start of every song, and it not convenient for me because I have to carry my phone with me at my apartment. To press the button to continue to next song. And during a long song sometimes a commercial comes up in the middle of the song. And if you are listening for a period of time it will pause on your songs for no reason. 
I‚Äôm handicapped in a wheelchair I don‚Äôt like to have to carry my phone around with me to listen to my music. Because having to press button to advance to next song or because it went into pause mode. 
And you charge higher price for commercial free. Can you give better price to me for commercial free and stop the unwanted 
Pause while I am listening to my music?

title: There‚Äôs just one Problem
text:
The other day I was actually having a good time with this app and watching my favorite you tubers, memes, and all sorts of videos. Don‚Äôt get me wrong I still love the app, but there was one thing I noticed the other day and it was these things called ‚Äúshorts‚Äù...

I tapped on it thinking it was a normal video but apparently any video that‚Äôs 6 or 18 seconds long means that it‚Äôs a short. It took me to a completely different page with all sorts of short vids and there was no way I could actually watch the video how I used too.

If there is a chance maybe please patch this and fix it to the way it used to be, that would be great. But of course I still love the app and I will always be on it! üëç

title: One issue.
text:
One of the main issues I really see with the app is the playlists feature. There area few  problems with this, one being how it'll automatically add it to your last used playlist. If you'd like to add the video to a different playlist, not the last one you used, you'd have to select the arrow again. This is where it gets tricky. The arrow does not always signify if it is removed or added to a playlist. It sometimes won't even be in a playlist it says the video was in. 

        A smaller issue is that the playlists will double videos, if you try to get rid of one, it removes only both. This is frustrating when using playlists such as sequence videos (part one, part two, etc.) or listening to music.

title: Recent update made 5/4

title: Great but the instability of features is just awful
text: I would switch this right to five stars if they stopped doing this, they keep changing what features are and are not available, I always loved swiping between videos to easily go back if I mis-press and go to a video when I am still watching or mean to press a different video, with swiping all videos in the recommendations stayed the same as what they were before I went to a different video (I was watching video A which had recommendations A and accidentally hit video B, I could go back and recommendations A would still be there) this doesnt happen anymore. I now have to put videos in watch later if I want to see them, which is a hassle, and my watch later playlist is filled to the brim now of weird videos that seemed interesting at the time. And hitting the back button feels clunky compared to just swiping back. Please stop removing features, please.

title: I love the app, but I am here to report a bug
text: This problem has only occurred within the last hour, but while using the app, it doesn‚Äôt show me anything, and it says that there is an error loading, and won‚Äôt show me any videos in my subscriptions list or anything for that matter. I can search videos and their thumbnails and titles will pop up, but when I click on the video it won‚Äôt play and the same error displays. I am not sure if it‚Äôs a networking error, but I do not believe it is as I am perfectly capable of searching, and I am on wifi, receiving messages and etc. I am disappointed because I use this app so much. Literally 60% of my screen time. Anyway I hope this is helpful, because I love the platform as a creator and a user.

title: What happened?
text: I have had this app for many years and I have never had a problem with it ‚Äî until now. The home page of the app does not load and is in a constant state of refreshing. As someone that is constantly looking for new videos that are recommended to me, doing so has become much more difficult. Instead, I am forced to rely on the trending page, which barely ever has any quality videos, and my subscription page, which is satisfactory until I inevitably watch all the videos that my subscribed channels have posted up to that point. Despite numerous updates for ‚Äúbug fixes and improvements,‚Äù since this beginning of this issue, not one of them has solved this issue. Please fix this problem soon, as I cannot live without new and fresh videos. You cannot just provide such a fantastic algorithm for recommending videos and then suddenly just cut me off from all these wonderful recommended video. To do so is like cutting the legs off a marathon runner.

title: Great app! Just one thing tho‚Ä¶

title: Daily user
text: I‚Äôm so grateful for this app! Truly I am! I use it all day every day! From guided prayer, meditation, & sermons, to getting my jam on (playlists that reflect my mood or what day it is) and that‚Äôs just me! My kids also LOVE this app (making me love it even more!) As a single mom of special needs kids who became unemployed after my youngest was diagnosed, I need all the help I can get! This app helps me in so many ways I had to take a moment to share just how much I appreciate everyone who makes this app & all the videos possible! I just hope it remains available to all regardless of who you are, where you come from, rich or poor, etc, because EVERYONE should have access to an endless supply of resources this app provides!

title: One annoying problem
text: I don‚Äôt write reviews much, but I am extremely upset that the smaller video layout has been changed. You used to be able to swipe down on a video and watch it in a little box while browsing for your next selection. If you didn‚Äôt want to watch that video anymore you could just swipe it away. Now you can still swipe down, but the video is about 50% smaller and the rest of the space is taken up by the title of the video (unnecessary because I‚Äôm already watching it, I know what it‚Äôs called), a play/pause button and an ‚Äúx‚Äù. Instead of allowing the users to just swipe away the video, the developers have decided to take away space from the size of the video to put an ‚Äúx‚Äù that you have to click if you want to exit the video. It‚Äôs a waste of space and moved in the wrong direction. I would love it if that was fixed.

title: Background Play Issues
text:
I don‚Äôt think background play should be a premium feature. But for some reason it is, despite the fact that you wouldn‚Äôt be able to skip ads and video watch time would be higher since skipping around or changing videos would require several extra steps. So I pay for it, because my job would be boring without background videos. 

So it would be nice, as we have to pay for the feature - if it at LEAST worked half okay. Videos randomly stop playing all the time, when they start at all. If it stops playing it closes the app, and when you reopen it the video either starts from a random earlier point or doesn‚Äôt come up at all and won‚Äôt be in the history section. For a basic feature that should be free but seemingly arbitrarily isn‚Äôt, you‚Äôd think it might work well at the very least.

title: I really miss the option for videos to buffer.
text:
When I go through the effort to select a specific video quality, I Do Not Want the video to start playing at a lower quality for five seconds before it fails to play the video any further. 
I would vastly prefer an option to preload and buffer the video at a higher resolution when in a low data area over being stuck in stop and go 144p video. I can wait five minutes for a video to buffer enough that I can view it uninterrupted at a higher quality. 
Further I would like an option for a minimum buffer time so that I can guarantee the video won‚Äôt start playing and then stuttering five or even thirty seconds later. 
When I have stable access to internet the app is great, but I would really love good low-data options such as the above being added in.

title: Amazing, but there is an issue.

title: Comment Section / Recommended Video Size
text:
I absolutely love this app dearly and it has some amazing content that can even be rated as high production movie quality, but the switch to the comment section and how it operates has become less efficient. Before, the comment section was an extra section at the bottom of the page, and it now is a openable ‚Äúpop up‚Äù at the top of the recommended videos. It is much more unportable to use this way. 

The recommended videos have also become much bigger and more difficult to slide through, and as a person that tends to know right away what kind of videos I want to watch based by the title, the enlarged preview short clips and the reduced title size has become more uncomfortable to use. 

To be completely honest, I liked the version we had a few days ago, and many seem to hate the new one now as well.

title: One of my most used apps
text:
I use this app all the time on my iPhone, since I have a paid ad-free account.
A few things I would like improved:
1. Shorts videos do not have rewind/forward controls like the normal videos do. If I miss something, I have to wait until the whole video is finished and repeats itself.
2. The video suggestions on the home screen seem to be different compared to the apple tv version of the app. I prefer the apple tv suggestions more than the iPhone video suggestions/recommendations.
3. I wish I could change the order that the downloaded videos play (without having to download them again), since I often download them to listen to out of wifi range and I have to listen to them in the order downloaded.

title: Ads are overdone at this point
text:
The double ads is the last straw. Ill be looking into ad blocks because 1) I‚Äôm not going to pay out money to you, for unconvincing me. 2) The double ads are incredibly excessive. It‚Äôs incredibly annoying, and potentially dangerous when i‚Äôm listening to a podcast while driving and have to constantly interact with my phone. Your anti consumer policy has negatively impacted the experience for virtually anyone who uses your terrible platform.

Edit: Now you‚Äôre going to hide how many ads are in a video and where they are placed? absolutely disgusting and anti consumer. Just can‚Äôt keep encroaching huh?

Edit 2: And now you‚Äôre removing the biggest tool the consumer has on this website and that‚Äôs the dislike button. It‚Äôs remarkable how this company routinely tries to destroy its own reputation. It‚Äôs baffling how they can consistently be anti consumer because they‚Äôre sponsors dislike the majority using the tool provided to begin with.

title: you ruined it
text: The initial idea-a platform for anyone to express themselves- was beautiful. However, your fear of insulting irresponsible parents by having swearing or otherwise on an app that is made for adults is ridiculous. The algorithm you‚Äôre using is terminating harmless channels that do not even curse, being apparently using a word that might ‚Äúhurt someone‚Äôs feelings‚Äù is bad, and talking about a natural human interaction makes creators be so vulgar that they can‚Äôt even be seen by the general population. The way you‚Äôve created this app has been disappointing. I was truly expecting something better of this. However, as this is the only platform I can easily use, I will continue to fuel your greed by viewing your stupid ads. Which, by the way, just show how much this isn‚Äôt intended as a way to express yourself. (BTW, you‚Äôll get more money if you monetize people who curse or have different opinions because that‚Äôs what people want to see~)

title: Crashing with comments; can‚Äôt sign in
text: I usually have no issues with this app but in the past 2 weeks or so, I‚Äôve noticed some glitches. Every time I post a comment, the app crashes, or ‚Äúquits unexpectedly.‚Äù Never seen this happen before. I can write out the whole comment and read other comments fine, but when I press post, it crashes immediately. Sometimes the comment will successfully post anyway, but other times it will just disappear. Another recent problem is not on my app, but my sister‚Äôs. She has a child account, and every time we try to sign her in, going through all the steps and authorizing it with the parent account, nothing happens. Her account is listed under accounts when we click the sign in icon at the top of the screen, but it‚Äôs faded out and we can‚Äôt click on it. I don‚Äôt know if this one is user error or an app issue, but we haven‚Äôt been able to figure it out.

title: 2 videos at once
text: So I‚Äôm not sure sure if this has happened to anyone else, but lately I‚Äôd be on my Home page looking at my recommendations, and I‚Äôd hover over a video and it was show a clip or I‚Äôd push the ‚ÄúNot interested‚Äù button on a video, and then I‚Äôd find a video I want to watch, so I‚Äôd click on it but the audio from the other video that I‚Äôd just hovered over or removed from my Home page would start playing with the current video I would want to watch. And I don‚Äôt know why, so what I do is take off the video I‚Äôm currently watching and the audio some times stops playing and other times it won‚Äôt, so I try to click another video to see if it would stop and sometimes it works but other times the audio just starts playing again with the current video. Not liking this glitch.

title: The best learning self education platform in the world
text: 7 years ago I was basically a idiot like most American citizens and completely dumbed down. title: Practical Art
text: I loved it! I would like a better camera perspective in the future. If you could pull back the camera or phone just a little more so we could see your face and the whole guitar that would be ideal. Was that your guitar playing in the background in the beginning? It would be nice to hear it throughout the video. When you do an update I would like to hear some of the responses you get from your viewers that support your case for the romantic guitar. Does restoration decrease the value of an old guitar? I‚Äôve heard that a good wood worker can tell you the type of wood just by smell. You obviously have that ability. Other than smell, color and density are there other ways to distinguish one wood from another? Keep the videos coming!

title: I‚Äôm switching

You are awful, and you better whip yourself into shape before someone takes the opportunity to show you up, because I know for a fact, I and many other users will leave the moment they do.

title: In Regards to the Latest Update
text: I only just opened the app on my iPad to which I immediately noticed that there was an update. In the past, when you opened the app on an iPad you would be greeted with a few rows of videos and you could scroll down. With the new update, however, they‚Äôve made it so when you open it on the iPad it‚Äôs treated like a phone. One video will take up the screen and you‚Äôll scroll. I have no problem with this on my phone, however, with how big the screen of an iPad is it is a bit obnoxious. The previous version just felt a lot better. I‚Äôm not sure if there‚Äôs a way to change this within the settings or if this even made sense, but if it did, please change it back. Thank you.

title: Hot Garbage

title: STOP CHANGING IT!

title: Don‚Äôt agree with certain philosophies from Google
text: First, I don‚Äôt like that Google is a liberal company and actively sensor conservative sites and videos.  Don‚Äôt like how they have to interrupt the video with an ad I‚Äôm not going to purchase anything from.  Put them at the beginning and the end and always allow me to skip . If there was another option, I would switch in a heartbeat!!  There are many great people on here and I‚Äôm appreciative of the ability to watch a video and learn something new.  I just am not a fan of how they decide who stays and who goes.  Obviously if something inappropriate is going on such as well violence or bullying, I agree it should be stopped.  But to take someone off because they don‚Äôt get any ad revenue is a bit like Big Brother!  And I don‚Äôt feel advertising revenue should be the focus, it‚Äôs supposed to be a platform of sharing and educating.

title: one of the most useful features has been converted to premium
text: i love this app and how accessible it is, but there is just one problem. the feature where you could watch videos when you left the app isn‚Äôt free anymore. i literally can‚Äôt afford anything at the moment, so if this feature (which is VERY accessible btw) wasn‚Äôt made premium only, that would be great. if i bought premium just for that reason, it would be stupid since it used to be free. now, i have to pay to watch a video while i‚Äôm editing (i watch deep dives as they help me focus). make it make sense! if this feature could be free again, that would be helpful. even more helpful due to the fact that you wouldn‚Äôt have to pay! tl;dr i love this app, but you removed one of the most useful features and made it where you have to pay.
